Name: Fates Call: A New Beginning
About the game: Fateâ€™s Call: A New Beginning embark in an epic VR Fantasy RPG ! You are Talos, a hero that has been awoken by ancient ghosts to save it's world once again. Evil forces are plotting against peace. You are the only one who can stop them. Fully voiced story, travel across the world of Fates Call ! Explore the vast lands, delve into it's dark dungeons, and travel across the open seas. Battle hordes of enemies and bosses as you progress in Fates Call story. Parry their attacks and find an opening to cut them to pieces ! Annihilate them with powerful spells Or follow the path of the ranger, and fill your enemies with arrows You'll meet several companions, each of them has unique gameplay and will help you during your journey ! Compatible Headset & Controllers : Vive, Index, Oculus, Window Mixed Reality
